PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
To Identify the correlation between Emotional Intelligence and Happiness we scraped Twitter to get Emotionally Intelligent and Emotionally weak tweets. 
Then through sentimental analysis of the tweets we were able to categorise them as Positive or Negative. The project was inspired from  DeNeve and Cooper’s (1998) meta-analysis which emphasised the effect of personality traits (such as Emotional intelligence) on happiness.

Mentor: Prof. Rajllakshmi Guha

ExCCitement_extractor is an automatic highlights extraction software for soccer and similar sports. It works by first generating excitement curve of the sports match and then extracting the highly exciting part of the curve.

Mentor - Valentin Zulkower
Language - Python

https://summerofcode.withgoogle.com/projects/#5422945299070976

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Building an API for market analysis
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
The project aimed for building a common API for fulfilling needs of both businesses and investors, by providing them insights on the future market structure. 
The project used a neural networks, regression and k-clustering analysis for predicting industry wise growth of different business sectors.
It also included techniques for scraping data from various data sources ( like LinkedIn, US Govt. website, etc. ) for deriving the information required for the study.

VirtualKGP is a Virtual Reality app that will let people from all around the world teleport themselves to the IIT Kharagpur campus. Through the application, users can take virtual tours and experience the campus life of IIT Kharagpur.
The application is under development and we plan to launch the application on various platforms like Android, iOS, Windows, Linux and MacOS with its integration with VR devices like OculusRift, Google Daydream, HTC Vibe, Google Cardboard soon.

HONOR & AWARD.Title: TCS IT Wiz 2013 - Regional Runner up
